timeline.bodyText: just out of curiosity is it not possible to do just class.getName()?
timeline.author: Zelldon

timeline.bodyText: do you think this is necessary? Or is this because dot is not allowed?
timeline.author: Zelldon

replies.bodyText:
More an aesthetic preference. Otherwise the metrics might e.g. be called:
rocksdb_memory_rocksdb.cur-size-all-mem-tables
Felt this was a bit redundant.
Happy to change it, though.
replies.author: pihme
